sql.if: ${accountName.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_account WHERE m_crm_product.accountid=m_crm_account.id AND m_crm_account.accountName LIKE '%${accountName.value}%') > 0

${contactName.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_contact WHERE m_crm_product.contactid=m_crm_contact.id AND CONCAT(m_crm_contact.firstname, m_crm_contact.lastname) LIKE '%${contactName.value}%') > 0

${contractId.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_type_relationship, m_crm_contract WHERE m_crm_type_relationship.type=6 AND m_crm_type_relationship.type1id=m_crm_product.id AND m_crm_type_relationship.type2id=m_crm_contract.id AND m_crm_contract.id=#{contractId.value,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) > 0

${productId.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_type_relationship, m_crm_product as relatedProduct WHERE m_crm_type_relationship.type=14 AND m_crm_type_relationship.type1id=relatedProduct.id AND m_crm_type_relationship.type2id=m_crm_product.id AND relatedProduct.id=#{productId.value,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) > 0

mapper.sql: SELECT m_crm_product.id, m_crm_product.productname, m_crm_product.status, m_crm_product.accountid, m_crm_product.website, m_crm_product.quantity, m_crm_product.serialnumber, m_crm_product.assessnumber, m_crm_product.contactid, m_crm_product.supportstartdate, m_crm_product.supportenddate, m_crm_product.salesdate, m_crm_product.unitprice, m_crm_product.description, m_crm_product.producturl, m_crm_product.supportcontact, m_crm_product.supportterm, m_crm_product.supportdesc, m_crm_product.cost, m_crm_product.listprice, m_crm_product.groupid, m_crm_product.tax, m_crm_product.taxClass, m_crm_product.mftNumber, m_crm_product.vendorPartNumber, m_crm_account.accountName as accountname, m_crm_product.lastUpdatedTime, CONCAT(m_crm_contact.firstname, m_crm_contact.lastname) AS contactname, m_crm_product.createdTime, m_crm_product.createdUser FROM m_crm_product LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_account ON (m_crm_product.accountid=m_crm_account.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_contact ON (m_crm_product.contactid=m_crm_contact.id)
